definitions.definition: That part of the beard which grows upon the sides of the face , usually of the male, or upon the chin, or upon both.
One of the long, projecting hairs growing at the sides of the mouth of a cat , or other animal.
The (very small) distance between two things.
examples: It missed falling on your foot by a whisker .

definitions.definition: Spreaders from the bows to spread the bowsprit shrouds .
A graphic element that shows the maxima and minima in a box plot .
One who, or that which, whisks , or moves with a quick, sweeping motion.
A small tendril that forms on metal.

main_definition: That part of the beard which grows upon the sides of the face , usually of the male, or upon the chin, or upon both.
secondary_definitions: One of the long, projecting hairs growing at the sides of the mouth of a cat , or other animal.
( colloquial ) The (very small) distance between two things.
( nautical ) Spreaders from the bows to spread the bowsprit shrouds .
( statistics ) A graphic element that shows the maxima and minima in a box plot .
One who, or that which, whisks , or moves with a quick, sweeping motion.
( metallurgy ) A small tendril that forms on metal.
